thread.section_title: Street Smart Transmission Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Street Smart Transmission | streetsmarttransmission.com
thread.title: Greg from Ohio
thread.title_full: Street Smart Transmission reviewed by Greg from Ohio

author: Greg from Ohio
title: Greg from Ohio
text: Was very impressed of the fast service and knowledge of the sales team. Very quick response to everything. My tranny shipped and arrived super fast. Nice to work with a clean fresh part. Installed and ran excellently. If it last as long as the original I'll be a happy camper. Very easy return also. Thanks.
